channel.title: Crazy Morning
channel.description:
[center][size=30pt][font=Arial]Ma Crazy Morning[/font][/size]
Howdy, the following story I am about to write may horrify and disturb you, if you are epileptic this [b]will[/b] kill you. [/center]
Well, I woke up after a dream of me getting a sheet of professionally produced LSD (it came with a leaflet and funky designs) and trying to hide it from whoever until i had the time to take some. I was dreadfully disappointed when I realised it was a dream and led there thinking about what it would be like if I did have a sheet of it. Then I got up and had a sleepy shower, licking my lips and thinking "Hey, I'm gonna have a shave!".
I got out of the shower, naked, and got my razor and foam shit and took my tashe off, looking at my lovely mound of pubic hair and wondering what it would be like to be bald down there for the first time in years. Thrilled by the thought I quickly hacked away at it (With an old razor... I'm not that much of a tramp that i would use the one for my face down there.) happily unaware of what was to come. My first difficulty was the pubes, I emptied the sink regularly to wash them away but they inevitably got stuck with led to me having to get a handful of toilet paper and dispose of them. Then I noticed the tiny bubbles of blood, scattered over my pubic region like delicate little ladybirds, and was starting to think this wasn't a very good idea by now and I wiped them away, emptying the sink for a second time.
By now I was laughing at myself and thinking "This would be a great thing to post on Mopar!". It was about 20 minutes until i had got rid of most of it but then I felt my bald patch and felt little bristles (I love them things cos when you have bristles and you shave them off it's like the same satisfaction of cutting grass). I set off with my razor and got rid of it all then stood back to admire. Realising it didn't matter if I stood back or not I jumped up and down in front of the mirror (which is quite high up) and was slightly disappointed by my work. I don't know what I expected but I knew it wasn't what I wanted. I looked like a 7 year old. Then I remembered this thing i heard that it makes your penis look bigger and quickly got an erection to study this theory. It's true but at the risk of looking pretty pathetic.
So I leave you with the note of "Don't shave it all off, just trim it ;)"

@goatee wrote:

I wasn’t on LSD? I had a dream about LSD, it was pretty irrelevant but stuck in my mind so I thought I should include it.

item.title: Crazy Morning
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“Chimaera God, post:39, topic:170451”][quote author=Mr.Chris link=topic=230375.msg1973439#msg1973439 date=1199387389]
If you cut hair, such as your pubic hairs, with a razor, and go at it, the hairs snap beneath the skin, and grow up through the skin, creating a very horrible looking ‘rash’. Before these ‘spots’ get infected, you’ll want to scrape the hairs out with a needle. But don’t fear. Only do this to the ones that bubble up with puss. Usually the rest go away.

Good job on shaving your pubes You’re going to go through hell for a week, lol.

P.S. Trimming is probably best, rofl.
[/quote]

That’s not good, happened to me yo.[/quote]

Sorted itself out yet?

My “rash” has disappeared from the sides already, which I’m happy about and there are already lovely little hairs growing. The hairs are pretty good now and getting less bristly, I can’t wait to grow up and tell this funny story.

Read full topic

item.title: Crazy Morning
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Fucking sucks ATM. Uncomfortable, itchy and some little red spots (mainly around where i cut myself lol).

But damn do my pubes grow fast… they are like 7mm long already in about 40 hours. Bristly and sharp, nightmare sleeping and masturbating isn’t too comfortable. Hey, I learn from my experiences.

Walking fucking hurts though, i mean its like pure hell. I went out today and when I got home my legs were all red where the pubes at both sides of my genitals rubbed my leg like little needles. Not many ingrown hairs though, only about 20% of men get them.

Read full topic
